mapper.insert: INSERT INTO village_bbs(vNum, userId, subject, content, hitCount, regDate, vcNum, areaNum, addr2, vBlat, vBlon) VALUES (village_bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, 1, #{areaNum}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vBlat, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vBlon, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM village_bbs v JOIN member m ON v.userId = m.userId
SELECT vNum, v.userId, userNickName, subject, content, TO_CHAR(v.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, hitCount FROM village_bbs v JOIN member m ON v.userId = m.userId WHERE vNum=#{vNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE village_bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE vNum=#{vNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT vNum, subject FROM village_bbs v JOIN member m ON v.userId = m.userId
AND (vNum < #{vNum})
ORDER BY vNum DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT vNum, subject FROM village_bbs v JOIN member m ON v.userId = m.userId
AND (vNum > #{vNum})
ORDER BY vNum ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE village_bbs SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE vNum = #{vNum}
